title: World Cup Bracket for round of 16

author: Giteaus-Gimp
text: Japan actually unlucky to finish top of the group

author: dalcer
text: Spain threw to get the easy bracket, it must be truth

author: letsridetheworld
text: How? I don’t think Morocco is easy tho. Their entire squad is from the west lol

author: Giteaus-Gimp
text: Not easy, Croatia were just finalists last World Cup and much higher rated in World rankings.

author: letsridetheworld
text:
So are Germany and Belgium…

The ranking is one thing but the current play stats are the most important

author: MAD_JEW
text: I mean they have the easy side of tournament but their first enemy is harder then on the other side

author: anonymus725
text: Why is coratia stronger than Morocco exactly? We dominated Belgium, they barely kept a draw.

author: MAD_JEW
text: Well i would say the fact that croatia got silver 4 years ago

author: anonymus725
text: Belgium got bronze four years ago too.

author: MAD_JEW
text: Yes but i still think that croatia is stronger then marocco

author: anonymus725
text:
1- they couldn’t beat Morocco

2- they got second in the same group

3- they got absolutely dominated by a Belgium side that Morocco absolutely crushed.


You can think what you want, but there is no evidence to support that

author: Basic-Sandwich-6201
text: Ye but Belgium played like shit first two games, they picked up their shit last game and then Croatia looks bad. Its not all black and white here

author: kikindo
text:
Croatia dominated both Morocco and Belgium (besides last 10min).
Not good enough to score vs. Morocco, plenty of chances and taken away penalty because of bullshit offside.
Looks like you need to rewatch the games with glasses this time.

author: New_Londo7
text: Bro you're biased japan will destroy your team

author: kikindo
text:
Biased? Let's see: vice-champion of the world, league nations final four, 1 defeat in 20 matches. 1 goal conceded in 3 games.
On of the best midfields in the world, one of the best defenders, one of the best wingers.
We have everything to win against anyone, but of course, only the match will decide.
On what do you base your opinion?
